item.title: Figment scape
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_tom 0wn3r tom
item.description:
@0wn3r_tom wrote:

heey, i have a command for it
add this somewhere at your commands, its means that players with total 29 can do ::member to get member

[code] if (command.startsWith(“member”) && playerLevel[24] >= 29) {

        sendMessage("Player " + playerName + " has become a Member!");
        disconnected = true;

        for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
            if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
                if (PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) {
                    PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/Members.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging Members!");
                }
               }
              }
             }
            }
           }
          }

[/code]

Read full topic
